statements: SELECT id, object_name, object_type, overlay_image_url, object_coordinates FROM ar_overlay_information;
SELECT * FROM ar_overlay_information WHERE object_type='furniture';
SELECT object_name, overlay_image_url FROM ar_overlay_information WHERE id=3;
SELECT object_type FROM ar_overlay_information WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, object_coordinates FROM ar_overlay_information ORDER BY object_name DESC;
SELECT id, object_name, overlay_image_url FROM ar_overlay_information WHERE object_type = 'furniture';
SELECT * FROM ar_overlay_information WHERE ST_Distance(object_coordinates, 'POINT(0 0)') <= 100;
SELECT object_name, object_type, ST_AsText(object_coordinates) AS coordinates FROM ar_overlay_information WHERE overlay_image_url LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT id, object_name, object_type, ST_X(object_coordinates) AS latitude, ST_Y(object_coordinates) AS longitude FROM ar_overlay_information ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, object_type FROM ar_overlay_information GROUP BY object_type HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM AR_Overlay_Info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_description FROM AR_Overlay_Info ORDER BY overlay_name ASC;
SELECT object_name, object_location FROM Real_World_Object WHERE object_name LIKE 'Desk%';
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_image_url FROM AR_Overlay_Info WHERE ar_object_id = 5 ORDER BY overlay_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Real_World_Object WHERE ST_Intersects(object_location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)', 4326));
SELECT id, overlay_name, overlay_description FROM AR_Overlay_Info;
SELECT object_name, object_location FROM Real_World_Object;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_description, overlay_image_url FROM AR_Overlay_Info WHERE overlay_name LIKE '%car%';
SELECT id, object_name, object_location FROM Real_World_Object WHERE ST_X(object_location) BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT DISTINCT overlay_name, overlay_description, object_name FROM AR_Overlay_Info INNER JOIN Real_World_Object ON AR_Overlay_Info.ar_object_id = Real_World_Object.id;
SELECT * FROM AR_Overlay;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_data FROM AR_Overlay ORDER BY overlay_name DESC;
SELECT object_name, object_description FROM Real_World_Object WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mapping_name, mapping_data FROM Spatial_Mapping WHERE mapping_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, mapping_name, mapping_description FROM Spatial_Mapping ORDER BY id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM AR_Overlay WHERE overlay_name = 'Overlay1';
SELECT id, overlay_name FROM AR_Overlay ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT mapping_name, mapping_data FROM Spatial_Mapping WHERE mapping_description LIKE '%indoor%';
SELECT * FROM Real_World_Object WHERE object_location = POINT(10, 20);
SELECT id, object_name, object_description FROM Real_World_Object WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM ar_overlay_info;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_description FROM ar_overlay_info WHERE overlay_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT object_name FROM object_data WHERE object_type = 'Furniture' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM ar_applications WHERE app_version = '1.0';
SELECT overlay_name, object_name, mapping_description FROM ar_overlay_info JOIN spatial_mapping ON ar_overlay_info.overlay_id = spatial_mapping.overlay_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_overlay_info;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_description FROM ar_overlay_info ORDER BY overlay_name DESC;
SELECT o.object_name, s.mapping_description FROM object_data o INNER JOIN spatial_mapping s ON o.object_id = s.object_id;
SELECT app_id, app_name, app_version FROM ar_applications WHERE app_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT o.object_id, o.object_name, a.app_name FROM object_data o LEFT JOIN ar_applications a ON o.object_id = a.app_id ORDER BY a.app_name;
SELECT * FROM ar_overlay_info;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_type FROM ar_overlay_info ORDER BY overlay_name DESC;
SELECT overlay_name, overlay_description FROM ar_overlay_info WHERE overlay_type = 'Augmented Reality';
SELECT object_name FROM real_world_objects WHERE object_category = 'Furniture' LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM ar_users ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT overlay_id, overlay_name, overlay_type FROM ar_overlay_info WHERE overlay_type = 'virtual' ORDER BY overlay_name DESC;
SELECT object_name, object_category FROM real_world_objects WHERE object_location = POINT(10,20);
SELECT map_description, map_image FROM ar_mappings WHERE mapping_id = 3;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM ar_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM ar_users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
